attributes.action: Ban the ‘Trump baby’ balloon from flying.
attributes.additional_details:
Sadiq Khan, the Currnet Mayor of London has approved the ‘Trump Baby’ balloon to fly over London on July 13th for the USA Presidents visit.

Like or hate Trump this event would make it embarrassing to be a British citizen and it should be banned.

I also ask for the Mayor of London to immediately resign for this show of irresponsibility in approving the balloon.
attributes.background: It is disrespectful towards not just president Trump but to the USA that this has been allowed to fly, and it will be an embarrassment to be a British citizen if this were to fly over London.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Mayor of London is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
